item.title: Hosting a local piano teacher business website
item.description:
Simple website for my mothers local business in German. I am not a web developer therefore I am using a simple onepage theme. With just a few changes the website was done.

I also adminstrate the google maps entry which helps for google searches as well.

Since the website and google maps entry she getÂ´s more potential students interested in piaono lessons.

Have a look here: https://www.klavierschule-friesen.de/

Next steps

  • Migrate to a hugo hosted side.
    • Better SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
  • Enable Netlify CMS
    • Enable editing the content by the client itself.
